question: What is the name of the Indian player who won the ITF men's Futures tennis tournament?
explanation: Indian player Ramkumar Ramanathan outplayed second seed Raymond Sarmiento of the U.S. 6-2, 6-2 in the final of the USD 15,000 ITF men's Futures tennis tournament in Singapore. It was the first title of the season for Ramkumar and 15th of his career.
